mapper.select: select seq_brd, brd_hitnum, brd_subject,brd_content, to_char(brd_inputdate,'YYYY/MM/DD') as brd_inputdate, mid from board where brd_type = #{brd_type}
mapper.update: update board set brd_hitnum = brd_hitnum+1 where seq_brd = #{seq_brd}
mapper.select: select m.mid as mid, m.name as name,c.comt_content as comt_content, c.comt_inputdate as comt_inputdate from (board b inner join comments c on b.seq_brd = c.seq_brd) inner join member m on c.mid = m.mid where b.seq_brd = #{seq_brd} order by c.comt_inputdate desc
